title: THIS IS A BOOK for the general reader as detailed references in footnotes and endnotes can be off-putting, especially as much of the literature is in a variety of languages. In the annotated list below there are suggestions for further reading on the main themes. As the book will, I hope, also be used by students on the borderline of the subject, I have provided a rather more detailed commentary than is strictly necessary for a general audience
